turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a coffee drink from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, no problem! What location do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order from the Starbucks in Malibu, California on West Malibu Road.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, got it. You want to order from Starbucks on W. Malibu Rd. in Malibu, California. What do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a Caffè Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what size do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, you want to order a Grande Caffè Latte. What kind of milk would you like to have in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want 2% Milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, 2% milk. Would you like to add anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to add vanilla syrup to the drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, I will request vanilla is added to the drink. Is there anything else you want to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, nothing else.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Let me confirm, you would like a Grande Caffè Latte with 2% milk and vanilla syrup added.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How would you like to pay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please use my Starbucks account information.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I will pay using your Starbucks account. Are you ready to finalize the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'm ready to place the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. I have just ordered you a Grande Caffè Latte with 2% milk and vanilla from the Starbucks located on West Malibu Road in Malibu, California. It will be ready for pick up shortly. I have sent the receipt to your mobile device as a text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.
